entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 6:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
